[2025-09-21 07:48:54.482 -04:00 INF] Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Database.Command Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__sessionId_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT TOP(1) [s].[SessionID] AS [SessionId], [s].[GroupID] AS [GroupId], [s].[CategoryID] AS [CategoryId], [s].[SessionName], [s].[Description], COALESCE([s0].[Transcript], N'') AS [Transcript]
